## Readme

This application creates a scatterplot based on mtcars data set, using variables that you select. 

You can choose:

- mpg
- disp
- hp
- drat
- wt
- qsec

Also, you can use colors for points.

- cyl
- gear
- carb

Finally, this application provides you a plot separation using:

- am
- vs
